an4.50:1.1: “Mendicants, these four corruptions obscure the sun and moon, so they don’t shine and glow and radiate.
an4.50:4.1: An eclipse of Rāhu, lord of titans …
an4.50:4.2: These are four corruptions that obscure the sun and moon, so they don’t shine and glow and radiate.
an4.50:5.1: In the same way, these four things corrupt ascetics and brahmins, so they don’t shine and glow and radiate.
an4.50:5.3: There are some ascetics and brahmins who drink beer and wine, not refraining from drinking beer and wine.
an4.50:5.4: This is the first thing that corrupts ascetics and brahmins …
an4.50:6.1: There are some ascetics and brahmins who have sex, not refraining from sex.
an4.50:6.2: This is the second thing that corrupts ascetics and brahmins …
an4.50:7.1: There are some ascetics and brahmins who accept gold and currency, not refraining from receiving gold and currency.
an4.50:7.2: This is the third thing that corrupts ascetics and brahmins …
an4.50:8.1: There are some ascetics and brahmins who make a living the wrong way, not refraining from wrong livelihood.
an4.50:8.2: This is the fourth thing that corrupts ascetics and brahmins …
an4.50:8.3: These are four things that corrupt ascetics and brahmins, so they don’t shine and glow and radiate.
an4.50:9.2: are plagued by greed and hate;
an4.50:10.6: make a living the wrong way.
an4.50:11.2: by the Buddha, Kinsman of the Sun.
an4.50:12.2: bondservants of craving, full of attachments,
an4.50:12.3: swell the horrors of the charnel ground,
